shared.model.game

Class TradeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.game.TradeManager

  • public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the trades between user-user and user-port
    Author:
    Raul Lopez Villalpando

    • Method Detail

      • canMakeOffer

        public static boolean canMakeOffer(User buyer,
                   User seller,
                   TradeOffer offer)
        Returns either if the offer can be made (if it's valid)
        Parameters:
        buyer - The user making the offer
        seller - The user receiving the offer
        offer - The offer that the first user is making
        Returns:
        Whether or not the offer is valid

      • hasEnoughResources

        public static boolean hasEnoughResources(ResourceCardDeck buyerDeck,
                         ResourceCardDeck compareDeck)
        Check if the Deck trying to buy has enough resources that the offer Deck specifies
        Parameters:
        buyerDeck - The Deck to check if it has enough resources
        compareDeck - The Deck with the resources to compare
        Returns:
        true if the buyerDeck has enough resources specified by compareDeck, false if it doesn't

      • priceForPiece

        public static ResourceCardDeck priceForPiece(PieceType type)
        Returns the price for the specified PieceType.
        Parameters:
        type - The piece type to get the price
        Returns:
        Returns a deck specifying the price. Returns null for ROBBER type

        public static ResourceCardDeck priceForDevCard()
